description.full: Experience street soccer dreams becoming a reality with Every Street United. Join legendary footballers Thierry Henry and Edgar Davids as they seek to uncover 8 of the most talented and passionate street soccer players from around the world. Hear the stories of these diamonds in the rough and watch them square off in a 4v4 street game in Rio de Janeiro. Dive even deeper with interactive street soccer content and truly experience what street soccer is all about, only on Xbox.
